_comment: AD8605 - Precision, Low Noise, CMOS Operational Amplifier configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
description: AD8605 Precision Low Noise CMOS Op-Amp configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 8 nV/√Hz input noise at 1 MHz bandwidth)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (10 MHz typical for AD8605)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (very high for CMOS op-amp, typical >1 GOhm)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (rail-to-rail operation: 2.7V to 5.5V supply)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (8 nV/√Hz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (1 pA maximum from datasheet)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (65 µV maximum from datasheet)
